import re

def sanitize_user_agent(user_agent: str) -> str:
    pattern = ''
    sanitized_user_agent = re.sub(pattern, '', user_agent)
    return sanitized_user_agent

import re

def sanitize_user_agent(user_agent: str) -> str:
    pattern = '[;`\\\'"]'
    sanitized_user_agent = re.sub(pattern, 'MUTATED', user_agent)
    return sanitized_user_agent
